traits.name: woo
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Woo theme love the challenge of meeting new people and winning them over. They derive satisfaction from breaking the ice and making a connection with another person.
traits.hates: a static or shrinking social network

traits.name: significance
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Significance theme want to be very important in the eyes of others. They are independent and want to be recognized.
traits.hates: being invisible to or ignored by others
traits.needs: an appreciative audience that will bring out my best

traits.name: strategic
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Strategic theme create alternative ways to proceed. Faced with any given scenario, they can quickly spot the relevant patterns and issues.
traits.hates: doing things the way we have always done them

traits.name: selfAssurance
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Self-Assurance theme feel confident in their ability to manage their own lives. They possess an inner compass that gives them confidence that their decisions are right.
traits.hates: others telling me what to do
traits.brings: a willingness to take necessary risks
traits.needs: freedom to act unilaterally and independently

traits.name: restorative
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Restorative theme are adept at dealing with problems. They are good at figuring out what is wrong and resolving it.
traits.hates: the idea that problems will disappear if they are ignored
traits.brings: courage and creativity to problematic situations

traits.name: responsibility
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Responsibility theme take psychological ownership of what they say they will do. They are committed to stable values such as honesty and loyalty.
traits.hates: disappointing others and being disappointed by others

traits.name: relator
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Relator theme enjoy close relationships with others. They find deep satisfaction in working hard with friends to achieve a goal.
traits.hates: the initial social discomfort of meeting someone new
traits.needs: time and opportunities for one-on-one interactions

traits.name: positivity
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Positivity theme have an enthusiasm that is contagious. They are upbeat and can get others excited about what they are going to do.
traits.hates: negative people who drain the life out of others
traits.needs: freedom to experience the joy and drama of life

traits.name: maximizer
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Maximizer theme focus on strengths as a way to stimulate personal and group excellence. They seek to transform something strong into something superb.
traits.needs: quality be valued as much as quantity

traits.name: learner
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Learner theme have a great desire to learn and want to continuously improve. In particular, the process of learning, rather than the outcome, excites them.
traits.needs: exposure to new information and experiences

traits.name: intellection
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Intellection theme are characterized by their intellectual activity. They are introspective and appreciate intellectual discussions.

traits.name: input
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Input theme have a craving to know more. Often they like to collect and archive all kinds of information.
traits.hates: not having things that would be useful to others
traits.brings: tangible tools that can facilitate growth and performance
traits.needs: space to store the resources I naturally acquire

traits.name: individualization
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Individualization theme are intrigued with the unique qualities of each person. They have a gift for figuring out how people who are different can work together productively.
traits.brings: an understanding of people that is valuable for placement
traits.needs: individual expectations that are created to fit each person

traits.name: includer
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Includer theme are accepting of others. They show awareness of those who feel left out and make an effort to include them.
traits.brings: a high level of tolerance with and acceptance of diversity

traits.name: ideation
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Ideation theme are fascinated by ideas. They are able to find connections between seemingly disparate phenomena.
traits.hates: doing what we have always done
traits.needs: freedom to explore possibilities without restraints or limits

traits.name: harmony
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Harmony theme look for consensus. They don’t enjoy conflict; rather, they seek areas of agreement.

traits.name: futuristic
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Futuristic theme are inspired by the future and what could be. They inspire others with their vision of the future.
traits.needs: opportunities to talk about the foreseen future

traits.name: focus
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Focus theme can take a direction, follow through, and make the corrections necessary to stay on track. They prioritize, then act.

traits.name: empathy
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Empathy theme can sense the feelings of other people by imaging themselves in others’ lives or others’ situations.
traits.hates: those things that block or limit emotional expression

traits.name: discipline
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Discipline theme enjoy routine and structure. Their world is best described by the order they create.
traits.hates: chaos and confusion, flying by the seat of one\'s pants

traits.name: developer
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Developer theme recognize and cultivate the potential in others. They spot the signs of each small improvement and derive satisfaction from these improvements.
traits.brings: a commitment (time and energy) to human growth

traits.name: deliberative
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Deliberative theme are best described by the serious care they take in making decisions or choices. They anticipate the obstacles.
traits.needs: time to listen and think before being expected to speak

traits.name: context
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Context theme enjoy thinking about the past. They understand the present by reaching its history.

traits.name: consistency
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Consistency theme are keenly aware of the need to treat people the same. They try to treat everyone in the world with consistency by setting up clear rules and adhering to them.
traits.brings: rules and policies that promote cultural predictability

traits.name: connectedness
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Connectedness theme have faith in the links between all things. They believe there are few coincidences and that almost every event has a reason.
traits.brings: an appreciation of the mystery and wonder of life and all creation
traits.needs: to be part of something bigger than myself: a family, a team, an organization, a global community, or a cosmos

traits.name: competition
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Competition theme measure their progress against the performance of others. They strive to win first and revel in contests.
traits.brings: an aspiration to be the best

traits.name: communication
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Communication theme generally find it easy to put their thought into words. They are good conversationalists and presenters.
traits.brings: attention to messages that must be heard

traits.name: command
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Command theme have presence. They can take control of a situation and make decisions.

traits.name: belief
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Belief theme have certain core values that are unchanging. Out of these values emerges a defined purpose for their life.
traits.hates: anything that does not mesh/align with my beliefs
traits.needs: a cause or purpose for which to live

traits.name: arranger
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Arranger theme can organize, but they also have a flexibility that complements this ability. They like to figure out how all of the pieces and resources can be arranged for maximum productivity.

traits.name: analytical
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Analytical theme search for reasons and causes. They have the ability to think about all the factors that might affect a situation.
traits.hates: things that are not or cannot be proven

traits.name: adaptability
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Adaptability theme prefer to “go with the flow.” They tend to be “now” people who take things as they come and discover the future one day at a time.
traits.brings: a willingness to follow the lead of change
traits.needs: present pressures that demand an immediate response

traits.name: activator
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Activator theme can make things happen by turning thoughts into action. They are often impatient.

traits.name: achiever
traits.description: People who are especially talented in the Achiever theme have a great deal of stamina and work hard. They take great satisfaction from being busy and productive.
traits.needs: freedom to work at my own pace
